entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
